reviewText: My three year old is in love with monster trucks. So while I was online searching for videos I came across this and thought great!! Boy was I wrong, it is not rated, so I figured it was harmless simple truck stuff.....NOPE! They have a bunch of drunk people running around, and bikini contests. Very little truck action; I turned it off about 10 minutes into it. It may be great for a young man, but not children!

My 6 year old was laid up with the flu and requested a Monster Truck video.  This video popped up in a search for Monster Truck videos and I selected "kids/family" as a criteria.  He was not impressed with the girls in bikinis and the like.

Not bad if you are a teen looking for a cheap thrill from the juxtaposition of trucks and hotties... not a kids video.
I bought this DVD for my 6-year-old who loves monster trucks. It has been one that he has watched numerous times.
This dvd sucks and is a waste of money. The monster trucks sucked in this!!!!!! You are better off burning this dvd if you have it.

My son loves monster trucks - and finding a video for him to watch on Netflix or Amazon on Demand was challenging.  So, I was thrilled to find this one available - until we watched it.  It is poorly produced, consisting of amateur looking video clips from some Monster Truck show in CA.  The video has as much or more bikini-clad women and tailgate partying as monster truck footage.  Not what I wanted for my preschooler. I wish it had come with a rating, or that the description of the video that appears on Amazon.com would have appeared on the Video On Demand ordering screen, so I would have known it was not appropriate for my son.

I got this for my three year old and he loves it. May have a little too many zoom ins on girls shaking their stuff for someone under the age of 13 though lol. However enuff vehicles to keep his attention and want to watch it again. The preview trailer is basically the entire DVD. Special features are kinda lame. Wish it was longer/had more content. My three year old has began to sing the songs playing on the DVD and speaking some of the slang that the host uses. Is worth as much as a three dollar rental for a one time viewing to me, but priceless to my kiddo who loves all sorts of trucks,  especially monster trucks.
Not what I thought it was! Definitely NOT appropriate for kids.
My nephew loves it.
My son love monster trucks.
Should have read the description before buying
My son did not like it. He is crazy for monster trucks but this movie was too short and did not hold his interest.
won't play in DVD Player

its not for young children, the video did have a bikini contest in it, I wasn't to pleased to show my 3 year old son half naked girls. yes its the 20th century but I want my son to respect woman and not think of them as objects.
Horrible quality and NOT child friendly.
awesome
I bought this for my son who loves his monster trucks... but found that there was more nude girls than anything. Such a bummer to have to throw it out. I don't need to subject him to that just yet :(
Great thanks!

I figure this is my own fault, but on the Roku I saw nothing that said this wasn't something kids shouldn't be watching....  This is not something little kids should be watching. Filled with more half naked women than anything else.

Regardless of it not being for kids....  This video is still pretty terrible, host is an idiot. Like some guy too terrible for the x-games.... And there isn't enough trunks.

Not really child appropriate. I didn't appreciate the scantily dressed "ladies", and the host looked like he'd downed a few Monster drinks before filming. I gave it 2 stars for the awesome trucks, though.
Junk. Wish I could get a refund.
Ordered this for my 5-year-old son, but it is nothing but women dancing in bikinis!
Not great. Spent to much time interviewing some trashy looking girls and not much trucks. Mostly loud music and no explanations.

Should have read the description better.  I rented this for my young nephews because they are both very into monster trucks.  This was very little about trucks and a whole lot about young gals in very little clothing.  Turned it off less than 20 minutes into it.  Not what I was looking for at all.
Rented this for my son. Big mistake. For adults only. Otherwise, it was a steaming pile of crap. If it were free, I'd want my money back.
I rented this for my toddler who's obsessed with monster trucks & turned it off 5 minutes in. Glad I only wasted $1.99.
I son loved it perfect great for kids
I am disgusted by this video! If you want to see bikini contests order this. What a waste of money!!!
I should have read the reviews. This is the worst truck video I have ever seen. Not worth 1 of the $10 American I spent.
We purchased this video for our son who loves monster trucks. It is not suitable for young viewers at all as it is full of close-ups of girls in bikinis.
Not what I expected.  Too short.  Too many bikinis.  Not at all educational.  Not for kids excited about monster trucks.

My 3 year old loves Monster Trucks. Warning extremely inappropriate for anybody under the age of 18. Why anybody, other than say a mechanic, over the age of 12 would want to watch this is beyond me. Come on guys make one kid friendly.
The kids love monster trucks!!  This is a fun book for a 4 year old while older siblings do the reading !!

Awful. Terrible. My little boy likes monster trucks. This is not for little boys. There's a lot more mostly naked women in string bikinis than trucks. Crappy film quality. Super ghetto. I wish I could get my money back. Didnt even watch 10 minutes if it. I would give it zero stars if allowed.
Worth a crap, don't spent your hard Earned dollar it's poorly made and surely not for my 3 year old grandson with half necked women

My 4 year old son LOVES monster trucks and I came across this in a video search. It is NOT worth the purchase. Its looks like it shot by absolute amateur videographers. Its NOT about monster trucks, like the picture on the front depicts. Its really about a car show in Southern California. The music is obnoxious, there are bikini clad women, its just awful. Do not purchase this movie!

::tip:: If you're looking for a monster truck video, search "monster jam" into youtube and you will get actual video footage of monster jam rallies. We watch it on our TV through our Roku box, there is a youtube channel on roku. Much better and you don't have to purchase something thats questionable.

I should have read the other reviews first, but my three year old is obssessed with monster trucks! This is not a video for children!!! Between the drunks and the bikini babes, it'll be teaching them a lot you don't want them to know. Plus the over all quiality is just bad. Bad editing, bad cinematography, audio is awful. Glad I only spent $1.99 to rent this and didn't buy it!
Bought this for my son and then realized it has women dancing around in their underwear.

Wish I had read the reviews before I showed this to my 2 year old grandson.  It is definitely NOT for children due to parading of scantily clad women and very suggestive grinding movements.  I was offended and I am not particularly prudish. It was obviously directed at adolescent boys/men. The Boy was baffled so I guess no harm done.  I took it home and threw it away!
Nephew loves it! Especially for the price.
We ordered this for my 4yr old son who loves Monster Trucks.... yeah...no.... we turned it off like 5 mins after it started. NOT APPROPRIATE FOR KIDS! Wish i would have read the reviews first!

My 4 yo son loves watching this movie. He is car/truck obsessed! The movie is a bit older and there isn't a lot of monster truck stuff in it, its mostly car stuff / stunt things in it, but my kid still loves watching it. The only thing I will say is that there is a bikini contest in it and the girls in bikinis appear in A LOT in the movie... My son always asks about them and why they are allowed to walk around in their "underwear" lol
My 3 year old grandson loved it.
You can't give it no stars.  Horrible
NOT for children!!!! I may have missed it in the description. Nothing serious, just a lot of half naked women.
Bought this for a child that likes Monster Trucks, this is definitely NOT for kids. Most of the time the camera is focusing on half naked girls at the tracks.  Don't recommend this.
Terrible. My son loves monster trucks but this was a huge let down. I do not recommend at all.
